title: [1.12.2-1.6.1][Uncrafting Table——分解工作台][永久更新][授权搬运]
author: yuudachi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuudachi 于 2021-2-15 12:14 编辑 

停更说明该MOD（不含其他fork分支）已官方宣布停更




Snipaste_2021-02-15_12-11-21.png (31.77 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

7 天前 上传





搬运申明之前MCBBS用户787878b有做过搬运《[1.7.10][ssp/smp]分解工作台——Uncrafting Table》（已锁帖），不过他本人已经主动弃坑很久（1年以上）并且坛内无其他接力帖，所以我决定继承他的遗志开始搬运
MOD简介（基于正式版）该MOD可以让你通过支付一定的经验值来将物品分解成合成前的物品。该MOD支持分解原版的物品也同时支持很多MOD中的物品，例如Mekanism（通用机械）、 IndustrialCraft（工业）。该MOD可以分解已掉耐久的物品，分为两种模式：（在MOD设置中“Uncrafting Method”项调整）
jglrxavpok 模式为部分返还，例如放入受损的钻石（铁）盔甲则会得到部分的钻石（铁锭）与钻石粒（铁粒）。
Xell75 & zenen 模式全部返还，为支付更多的经验值获得合成前的全部素材。该MOD可以分解附魔用品，在分解时放入一本书可以将附魔效果（全部）转移到书上。分解时不想支付经验得到全部的原料？没问题，在MOD设置中将“Minimum Level”与“Maximum Level”拉到0并且使用“Xell75 & zenen”模式即可。该MOD允许在设定中添加禁止分解的物品。

一些杂项食用方式分解工具箱的合成方式：中间工具箱周围一圈原石。9个钻石粒可以合成一个钻石（平铺工具箱9个格子，铁粒、绿宝石粒同样）。分解工具箱的分解方格左边放书（用来保存物品的附魔），右边放准备分解的物品，不可反摆。分解非有耐久设定的物品时，一定要放入足够数量（例如要得到一个橡木需要在放入4个橡木模板到分解工具箱内）。分解合成时材料非完全消耗的物品时需要再右边的9宫格内放入未消耗部分的物品（例如分解蛋糕的时候需要在右边的9宫格顶上3格放入空桶）。如下图：



MOD成就以下对成就的名称仅使用英文（同一序号的成就代表获得这些成就不需要以先获得同序号内其它成就为条件）Like the ol'days - 创建一个分解工具箱。Uncraft an item! - 分解任意一个物品。
Uncraft a diamond hoe! - 分解一个钻石锄。
Recycling time! - 分解一个皮革靴子。
Time for a cheaper approach. - 分解一个钻石铲。
All in one! - 堆一个如下图的东西（我不好形容，真的），然后打开分解工具箱界面

2017.03.01 - 首次发布
官方更新历史Minecraft 1.12.x

Version 1.8-beta5

Version 1.8-beta5 for Minecraft 1.12 / 1.12.1 - August 2017

Functionally equivalent to version 1.7.4
Disabled achievements due to their removal from Minecraft 1.12

Minecraft 1.11.x

Version 1.7.4
Version 1.7.3
Version 1.7.2
Version 1.7.1
Version 1.7

Version 1.7.4 for Minecraft 1.11.2 - August 2017

New Features

Added support for Applied Llamagistics
Bug Fixes

Fixed bug causing a game crash when using alternative uncrafting method
Fixed uncrafting slot not fully clearing when replacing an item with one of the same type
Fixed uncrafting message not clearing when shift-clicking from output grid
Version 1.7.3 for Minecraft 1.11.2 - July 2017

New Features

Added CraftTweaker scripting support
Added ability to uncraft items which can't be crafted (e.g. horse armour)
Added Mekanism support
Added support for Thermal Dynamics covers
Version 1.7.2 for Minecraft 1.11.2 - May 2017

Fixed incompatibility with Tinker's Construct
Added support for InGameConfigManager recipes
Version 1.7.1 for Minecraft 1.11 / 1.11.2 - May 2017

Functionally equivalent to version 1.4.4
Support for IC2 and Mekanism recipes available only for Minecraft 1.11.2 due to no 1.11 release of those mods
Ability to uncraft Tipped Arrows
Lacking Applied Energistics support due to that mod not being available for Minecraft 1.11.x
Iron Nuggets removed from 1.11.2 version due to their addition to Vanilla
Version 1.7 for Minecraft 1.11 - December 2016

Functionally equivalent to version 1.4.3
Uses Forge version update mechanism

Minecraft 1.10.x

Version 1.6.4
Version 1.6.3
Version 1.6.2

Version 1.6

Fixed bug causing a game crash when using alternative uncrafting method
Fixed uncrafting slot not fully clearing when replacing an item with one of the same type
Fixed uncrafting message not clearing when shift-clicking from output grid
Version 1.6.3 for Minecraft 1.10.2 - July 2017

New Features

Added CraftTweaker scripting support
Added ability to uncraft items which can't be crafted (e.g. horse armour)
Added support for Thermal Dynamics covers
Version 1.6.2 for Minecraft 1.10.2 - May 2017

Fixed incompatibility with Tinker's Construct

Minecraft 1.7.x

Version 1.4 was the final version by jglrxavpok. Version 1.4.1 was created by Jordy141.

Version 1.4.6
Version 1.4.5
Version 1.4.4
Version 1.4.3
Version 1.4.2
Version 1.4.1
Version 1.4

Version 1.4.6 for Minecraft 1.7.10 - August 2017

Bug Fixes

Fixed bug causing a game crash when using alternative uncrafting method
Fixed uncrafting slot not fully clearing when replacing an item with one of the same type
Fixed uncrafting message not clearing when shift-clicking from output grid
Version 1.4.5 for Minecraft 1.7.10 - July 2017

Bug Fixes

Fixed crash caused by uncrafting Applied Energistics 2 items
Version 1.4.4 for Minecraft 1.7.10 - May 2017

New Features

Support for Applied Energistics, IC2 and Mekanism recipes
Support for container items and recipes requiring tools
Support for multiple recipes
Ability to uncraft Fireworks
Utilisation of nuggets and leather strips as partial returns on leather, ingots and gems from damaged items
Utilisation of Rabbit Hide for partial returns on leather items
Enhancements

Uncrafting now only finalised when result is removed from the table
GUI upgraded with better feedback and recipe previews
Removing Enchantments now costs XP
Config options for managing partial returns and item registration
Server config now takes precedence over client config if the two are different
Config GUI can now be accessed in-game as well as from the main menu
Bug Fixes

Fixed game crash when encountering empty Ore Dictionary registrations
Fixed player receiving free enchanted books when uncrafting an enchanted book
Fixed incorrect multiplication of XP cost
Fixed shaped crafting recipes losing their shape
Fixed items being lost when performing multiple operations without clearing the output grid
Version 1.4.3 for Minecraft 1.7.10 - December 2016

New Features

Added version update checker to notify users of new mod versions
Enhancements

Added trapped chests and ender chests to the "PorteManteau" achievement check
Bug Fixes

Fixed player receiving free enchanted books when uncrafting enchanted tools without enough XP
Fixed startup crash when used on a server
Version 1.4.2 for Minecraft 1.7.10 - December 2016

New Features

Added ability to exclude items from uncrafting through configuration
Added support for recipes added using the MineTweaker mod
Enhancements

New Forge GUI for managing configuration data
Better handling of multiple enchantments on tools
Bug Fixes

Fixed metadata being ignored, leading to the wrong logs being created when uncrafting planks, etc.
Fixed configuration values not being read correctly.
Fixed achievements not registering
Fixed phantom items being spawned in the world if the player inventory is full
Fixed game crash when uncrafting an empty map
Fixed block being instantly breakable in survival
Version 1.4.1 for Minecraft 1.7.10 - May 2015

Updated to 1.7.10
Version 1.4 for Minecraft 1.7.2 - February 2014

You can now uncraft multiples items at the same time!
Updated to 1.7.2

Minecraft 1.6.x

All versions for Minecraft 1.6.x were written by jglrxavpok

Version 1.3
Version 1.2
Version 1.1
Version 1.0
Version 0.0

Version 1.3 for Minecraft 1.6.2 - September 2013

Added an "API" for modders (works with events, look at the source for more information)
Added new achievements available at the Uncrafting Table page (click on "Minecraft" in the Achievements Menu)
Added a new stat to count uncrafted items.
Fixed a silly bug causing the calculs to be wrong when Shift+Clicking on slots of the interface.
Minor bugs fixes
Mod is now open source
Version 1.2 for Minecraft 1.6.2 - August 2013

Put an enchanted item in the uncrafting table with books in the "Calculs" slot will transfer as many as possible enchants on the books and so give you enchanted books usable with the anvil.
Shift+Click on the slots of the table will no longer transfer the stacks anywhere.
Changed the texture loading to adapt it to the Ressource Pack system.
Version 1.1 for Minecraft 1.6.1 - July 2013

Add a new item slot to calculate how many XP levels you need.
You can change how many XP levels you need at least (and max you may need).
You can choose the uncrafting algorithm for damaged items (Thanks to Xell75 for his idea).
"32767 metadata bug" fixed
Version 1.0 for Minecraft 1.6.1 - July 2013

Damageable items returns only some of the items (depending on their condition).
If you put less items than needed, a message will say how many items you need.
Some items as half slabs returns the right items needed to craft them.
Version 0.0 for Minecraft 1.6.1 - June 2013

Initial Release
作者致谢This mod is a continuation of the Uncrafting Table Mod, originally created by jglrxavpok for Minecraft 1.6.1. jglrxavpok continued development up until 1.7.2, at which point he decided to stop working on it. Jordy141 then updated the mod to 1.7.10. Unfortunately the 1.7.x versions of the mod had a number of problems with them, and the mod was abandoned.

As the original mod was open source, I decided to pick it up and continue the development of it. jglrxavpok was kind enough to give me his blessing to do this, and has updated his original forum post to link here. He's also contributed some code to my version of the mod.

Credit also goes to Nevik_9191 for providing the banner and logo graphics, for testing my releases, and for contributing ideas for new features and enhancements, and to Xell75 and Zenen for their xp-cost equation.
许可与权限本MOD采用LGPL v3（GNU Lesser General Public License version 3）许可。
你可以自由的将该MOD加入到你的懒人包，当然能够在帖子下面（原帖链接）留言让我知道你在你的懒人包中使用了我的MOD我会很感激，虽然并不是必须的。
PS:这里是翻译作者的话，所以不是在我这里留言，而是在csb987的发布帖里面留言
备注本作者CurseForge地址：
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/jglrxavpoks-uncrafting-table/files
本作者源代码地址：
https://github.com/crazysnailboy/uncraftingTable/
前作者源代码地址：
https://github.com/jglrxavpok/UncraftingTable/
https://github.com/Jordy141/uncraftingTable/

关于汉化2017.04.06新预览版中又添加了新物品和选项，所以原来的语言文件在该版本已经不能100%中文显示，新的语言文件已经提交给作者，估计下个版本会添加进去，基于尝鲜的可以自行复制下面内容替换原来的zh_CN.lang文件内容。
还是老话，如果有谁能提供更好的译文我会很高兴的，毕竟新内容的翻译部分我是按照功能效果翻的而不是基于英文的描述。
